Author: simplyskyla
Text: It’s very likely they will suggest inpatient. But I think your attitude towards it is very good, and it will carry you far in your recovery. Yes, if you do go in and miss Christmas and New Years with your family, use that as even more motivation to recover, sort of like “anorexia has already taken one Christmas with my loved ones away from me, and dammit, I’m not going to let it do it again.” I hope the best for you at your appointment ❤️
